title: José Maria da Fonseca 2015 Colecção Privada Verdelho (Península de Setúbal)
description: This ripe wine comes from the wide range of private collection wines by winemaker Domingos Soares Franco. It has acidity while also showing fine perfumes and a tangy texture. The wine is full in the mouth with a warm, rich aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Gotsa Family Wines 2013 Babaneuri Valley Mtsvane (Kartli)
description: Almost caramel in color, this wine offers aromas of lemon zest and vanilla bean. Grippy tannins provide a firm backdrop to flavors of lemon, clementine, green apple and caramel. On its own, it may seem too chalky for some drinkers, but enjoying it alongside nuts and hard cheese will put the balance into focus.

title: Spicewood 2014 Viognier (Texas High Plains)
description: Canned peach, banana and lilting white-flower aromas show some good concentration on the nose. The palate is playful and textured, with a pop of tropical fruit on the entry and more florals on the midpalate. A peach-fuzz texture tingles on the close.

title: Rocche dei Manzoni 2012 Perno Vigna Cappella di S. Stefano  (Barolo)
description: Aromas of oak, coconut, burned rubber and scorched earth lead the nose. The rather lean palate offers vanilla, licorice and a confectionary note while astringent tannins dry out the finish.
designation: Perno Vigna Cappella di S. Stefano

title: Sidewood 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Adelaide Hills)
description: This medium-bodied wine features aromas of green apple and crushed stone, while the flavors turn citrusy, veering toward lime and grapefruit. It's nicely silky in texture, while a hint of snow pea marks the finish.

title: Simonnet-Febvre 2014 Quintessence de Lyre  (Coteaux de l'Auxois)
description: Named after the Lyre style of vine training, this wine comes from the far north of Burgundy, close to Chablis. It is soft, smooth and creamy, with a light minerality and perfumed acidity. It is just right to drink now.

title: Salentein 2014 Killka Collection Red (Uco Valley)
description: Rubbery, stalky berry aromas rate as earthy. In the mouth, this hammers away with cheek-grabbing tannins. Stewed plum, tomato and herbal flavors carry over onto a chunky finish. This is 50% Malbec, 35% Cabernet Sauvignon and the rest Syrah and Petit Verdot.

title: Quinta de Porrais 2013 Porrais Red (Douro)
description: Spicy and ripe, this is a wine that is soft, full in the mouth and with generous tannins. It does have a mineral edge that adds shape to the wine and crispens the black-plum flavor. Drink the wine now.

title: Paul Anheuser 2014 Schlossböckelheimer Königsfels Kabinett Riesling (Nahe)
description: There's a particularly lean, light-footed quality to this minerally off-dry Riesling. The palate boasts fresh lemon and lime flavors shaded in savory tones of earth, dust and bee pollen. The finish is long and lemony. Drink now through 2018.

title: Piattelli 2015 Reserve Torrontés (Cafayate)
description: This is a highly fragrant Torrontés with exotic tropical aromas of lychee and bath oil. Light and fresh in body, this tastes of pithy citrus and lychee before hollowing out. A lingering finish with good acidity is the close.

title: Veritas 2014 Viognier (Monticello)
description: A pleasant concentration of tropical-fruit cocktail carries the nose, with a fresh grassy-green note popping up—out of character, yet enjoyable. The medium-bodied palate is juicy, fruity and textured in pineapple rind and Juicy Fruit gum. A peach fuzz texture lingers on the tongue.

title: Vinadeis NV La Cuvée Mythique Méthode Traditionnelle Brut Réserve Chardonnay (Vin de France)
description: Ripe apples and creamed pear give this wine its fruity character. It has balanced, crisp acidity, with touches of almond and lime juice. The wine is immediately attractive and ready to drink.
designation: La Cuvée Mythique Méthode Traditionnelle Brut Réserve

title: Viniverde 2015 Estreia Reserva Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)
description: From the classic Alvarinho area in the north of Vinho Verde, this is soft and ripe. It has a creamy character with lemon crispness and a touch of pineapple. The wine will be ready from early 2017.

title: Vinkara 2013 Reserve Narince (Ankara)
description: A soft bouquet of Asian pear primes the palate for flavors of pear, quince, grapefruit and freesia. This refreshing wine has a touch of lemon on the soft, lingering finish.

title: Terre Rouge 2013 Vin Doux Naturel Muscat Blanc à Petits Grains (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
description: An earthy, nutty aroma and flavor come through the intense sweetness and full body of this dessert-style wine. It goes for earthy complexity rather than obvious fruit flavors, and tastes high in sugar and alcohol.

title: Lava Cap 2013 American River Red (El Dorado)
description: This wine is well made in the lightly sweet but full-bodied style. It has plenty of ripe fruit flavors, high alcohol and moderate tannins to add texture.

title: Leaping Horse 2014 Red (California)
description: Spicy, anise-like aromas and lightly sweet fruit flavors recalling black cherries and strawberries give a lot of personality to this medium-bodied wine.

title: Leonard Kreusch 2014 Sweet Red Dornfelder (Rheinhessen)
description: Pristine red-plum and berry flavors abound in this fresh easygoing red. Semisweet on the palate and soft in acidity, it's a straightforward, juicy wine for everyday enjoyment.

title: Georges Duboeuf 2014 Domaine des Chenevières  (Mâcon-Villages)
description: This crisp, tangy wine is packed with citrus flavors. Brightly textured with a mineral edge, it is fruity, hinting at spice along with a floral, fresh character.

title: Gibbs 2013 Carpenter Vineyard Cabernet Franc (St. Helena)
description: A rose garden's worth of aromas lift out of the glass in this hearty, full-bodied red, the peppery tannins somewhat grippy on the palate before settling down. Blackberry punches through on the palate, given additional color and lift from the 5% Petit Verdot.

title: Hayes Valley 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Central Coast)
description: Fresh and sliced stonefruit aromas meet with the lightest touch of grass, a slightly reductive tar aroma and a bitter kumquat element on the nose of this wine. The palate is very light with lime peel, Gala apple and nectarine flavors.

title: Herdade da Comporta 2015 Private Selection White (Península de Setúbal)
description: A blend of Arinto and Antão Vaz, the wine is light, bright and attractively perfumed. It has juicy, tangy character, enhanced by the lemon zest and made richer with the melon fruits. Drink now.

title: Coelho 2014 Atração Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description: This is smooth and accessible, putting a light chocolate frame around rhubarb and strawberry fruit. There's a hint of pepper, and the wine is fresh and youthful, good sipping wine for late summer/early fall.

title: Coelho 2015 Renovação Estate Vineyards Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: Quite tart, the fruit here touches (just barely) on melon, with orange and lemon zest, a bit of lime, and plenty of acid. All stainless fermented, it went through full malolactic.

title: Caves da Montanha 2010 Vinha do Poeta Red (Dão)
description: This wine comes from the heart of the Dão region. It is firm and dark with tannins and a concentrated texture. Fine acidity cuts through the black-fruit character. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Deltetto 2012 Bussia  (Barolo)
description: This has aromas suggesting grilled herb, toasted oak, espresso and a whiff of wet animal fur. The palate offers dried cherry, game, anisette and a green note of bitter sage alongside extremely astringent tannins.

title: Diego Conterno 2012 Ginestra  (Barolo)
description: This opens with aromas of toasted oak, roasted coffee bean and a whiff of sawdust. The bracing palate offers dried cherry, espresso and mocha alongside astringent tannins. Give the tannins another year or two to unwind then drink to capture the remaining fruit.

title: Domaine Bousquet 2015 Reserve Pinot Gris (Tupungato)
description: Despite looking gold and mature, this PG exceeds expectations courtesy of waxy, baked-apple aromas and a full but balanced mouthfeel. Spiced apple, apricot and burnt orange flavors finish long due to core acidity. Drink immediately.

title: Van Ruiten 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
description: Very ripe in aroma, almost thick in texture and syrupy in flavor, this wine is full bodied, super fruity and smooth.

title: Vasse Felix 2015 Filius Chardonnay (Margaret River)
description: This wine starts with alluring scents of warm pastry dough and peaches. And it shows ample weight in the mouth without going overboard. Yet on the palate, the oak is slightly coarse and obvious. It's still a very good wine, just needs more finesse.
